wikipedia_page.main: Donald Whiston (4 April 1930 – 28 November 2020) was a former footballer who played in the Football League for Crewe Alexandra, Rochdale and Stoke City.

response: Donald Francis Whiston (June 19, 1927 – July 11, 2020)Donald Whiston obituary was an American ice hockey player. He won a silver medal at the 1952 Winter Olympics.Sports Reference Afterwards he coached at Brown for three seasons.
*Donald Whiston, 90, English footballer (Stoke City, Crewe Alexandra, Rochdale).Donald Whiston
